amendment.description: Amendment extends the new audit and reporting provisions applied only to the Direct Loan program to the Federal Family Education Loan Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-523 to extend the new audit and reporting provisions applied only to the Direct Loan program to the Federal Family Education Loan Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 191 (Roll no. 37).
